databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.KANKAKU, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS FROM MS_KYUMEISETUBI where MS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.KANKAKU, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS FROM MS_KYUMEISETUBI WHERE MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID

INSERT INTO MS_KYUMEISETUBI( MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME, KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME, :KANKAKU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_KYUMEISETUBI SET MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME, KANKAKU = :KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
